cards.name: Build a psychological profiling SaaS (Project: Self)
Design custom personality types (Big Five, MBTI, DISC, Tim Lahaye)
Set tone for branding: calming, insightful, scientific, beautiful
Ethical guidelines for data privacy & consent
Notifications via email or site reminders
Add a chatbot for self-discovery guidance
Enable anonymous test mode
Export results as PDF
Define SMART goals for MVP
Set up Trello, GitHub, and project README
Create wireframes / mock UI of onboarding, test, result page
Set up Next.js + TypeScript project
Install TailwindCSS + shadcn/ui components
Add Prisma + connect to Neon PostgreSQL
Deploy staging site to AWS
Set up Sentry for error monitoring
Draft 20–30 questions across trait dimensions
Create questions.json or questions.ts
Build answer model & scoring logic (rule-based)
Store answers in state
Display results based on score ranges
Assign personality types with names + descriptions
Design results page (score bars or radar chart)
Create personality type component
Store results in DB
Allow user to retake the test
Set up email sending (SendGrid or Resend)
Send personality report after completion
Set up email reminders (weekly advice)
Add basic authentication
Add user dashboard to view history
Add loading screens and feedback
Add chatbot (Coach Self) to answer questions
Train AI on user chat + data to give custom advice
Summarize behavior across time
Let user ask 'Why do I act like this?' and get LLM insight
Add consent-based webcam facial emotion detection
Add social media import (Twitter, Instagram insights)
Track click behavior and interactions to infer mood
Use mobile gyroscope/microphone to analyze energy
Build React Native / Expo app
Add push notifications
Sync results across web + app
Add premium in-app coaching sessions
Journal/diary integration
Daily self-awareness reminders
Offer freemium model with limited tests
Add pricing page with value explanation
Integrate Stripe for subscription
Premium feature: PDF export, private AI coach, personality history
Affiliate marketing (books, courses)
Offer white-label version to therapists/coaches
Allow gifting of Self Premium to friends
Track test completions
Track which traits are most common
Monitor funnel drop-off
Use PostHog or Plausible for analytics
Track email open rates and engagement
Set up GitHub Actions CI/CD
Automatic deployment to AWS (or Vercel for dev)
Secure .env management across environments
Connect Prisma to Neon DB with schema sync
Add Sentry for monitoring & alerts
Backup DB periodically
Study Big Five, DISC, MBTI mappings
Analyze Tim Lahaye’s trait categorization
Experiment with trait clustering in AI
Run a small beta test with 10 users
Gather real personality data anonymously
